title: 240 Perch land 100m to Main Road
details: 240 perch (Acre 1 .5) bare land with a 20 feet wide road is for sale near Nawalakagama junction (in between Ragama and Mahabage) with in 100m to Main Road (Nawalokagama Junction). Very Suitable for a Ware House/Factory/Housing or land project. The owner (My friend) lives abroad and willing to sell this property ASAP. the expected rate is Rs. 590,000/= per perch and it is negotiable.
